## Pages
- [Analytics - CITIFIX](/adminanalytics): View real-time analytics for civic issues.
- [Community Portal - CITIFIX](/communityportal): View and vote on issues reported by the community.
- [Dashboard - CITIFIX](/citizendashboard): View your complaints, track resolutions, and manage your CITIFIX account.
- [Leaderboard - CITIFIX](/leaderboard): See top contributors on CITIFIX.
- [My Complaints - CITIFIX](/mycomplaints): Track your submitted complaints.
- [Report an Issue - CITIFIX](/reportissue): Report a new civic issue.
